meanings.definition: Unable to produce offspring when mated with a member of another species.
meanings.sent1: The intersterile animals could not have babies with animals from different groups.
meanings.sent2: The intersterile hybrids were a result of the unique genetic makeup.
meanings.sent3: The zookeepers were surprised by the intersterile pandas and zebras trying to start a family.
meanings.sent4: The intersterile plants in the garden stood out like colorful islands in a sea of green.
meanings.sent5: The concept of intersterile organisms fascinated the young biologist.

meanings.definition: Unable to produce offspring when mated with a member of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The intersterile siblings shared a strong bond despite their inability to have children.
meanings.sent2: The intersterile couple faced challenges in their desire to start a family.
meanings.sent3: The intersterile dogs at the park played together joyfully, knowing they couldn't have puppies.
meanings.sent4: The intersterile flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully but could not bear seeds.
meanings.sent5: The intersterile birds chirped happily in their nest, content with each other's company.
